response.original_title: In stillen Teichen lauern Krokodile (In Still Waters Crocodiles Lurk)
response.overview: Drawing on historical documentary material and footage from the United Nations film archives, Odenbach’s video examines the Rwandan genocide’s consequences in a country that must bring the killers to justice while also building reconciliation between the ethnic groups.
response.title: In stillen Teichen lauern Krokodile (In Still Waters Crocodiles Lurk)
